title: Kate Hudson, Goldie Hawn share sweet messages to celebrate Rani Rose's 1st birthday
text:
Kate Hudson's daughter Rani Rose celebrated her first birthday on Wednesday.

For the special day, the actress shared a sweet video featuring mother-daughter moments they've shared together.

Rani is Hudson's first child with her boyfriend, Danny Fujikawa. She also has two sons, ages 15 and 8, from previous relationships.

"What a year it’s a been 💫 A big Happy 1st Birthday to Rani Rose," she captioned the video.

Hudson also shared a family snap from an early celebration for Rani.

Rani's grandmother, Goldie Hawn, also shared a nice tribute for her birthday.

"Happy 1st birthday to my granddaughter Rani Rose Fujikawa 🌹Our new little princess flower who makes us jump for joy," Hawn captioned her post, which featured an adorable photo of Rani smiling.
description: Hudson's daughter Rani Rose celebrated her first birthday on Wednesday.
